title: Fact Check: Don’t fall for FAKE links attributed to Ayushman Bharat Scheme | Newsmobile
author: newsmobile.in
vclaim:
Several links have been shared on various social media platforms, prompting users to click on them to register for Indian government’s flagship National Health Policy scheme, called, Ayushman Bharat.

ALSO READ: Has Union Minister Amit Shah been diagnosed with bone cancer? Here’s…

NewsMobile fact-checked the above links and found them to be FAKE.

We also found government sources, that clarified that several FAKE links were being circulated and were being falsely attributed to Ayushman Bharat – to procure personal data of Indian citizens.

In a tweet, the Press Information Bureau (PIB) explicitly confirmed that ‘https://pmjay.gov.in‘ is the only official website.

So, before clicking on any such links, check the URL to make sure it’s an authentic government source.
